message: Successfully fetched all the bid items

data.title: Vintage Camera
data.description: Rare 1960s vintage film camera in perfect working condition. Ideal for photography enthusiasts and collectors.

data.title: Electric Guitar
data.description: Stunning green electric guitar with classic design. Perfect for rock, blues, and live gigs.

data.title: Gaming Laptop
data.description: Powerful gaming laptop featuring Intel i7 processor, RTX 4060 GPU, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Ready for high-end gaming and editing.

data.title: Vintage Wooden Chair
data.description: Handcrafted wooden chair with classic design. Great for both indoor and garden use.

data.title: Poetry Book - Milk and Honey
data.description: Bestselling poetry collection by Rupi Kaur, exploring love, heartbreak, and healing.

data.title: Antique Watch
data.description: Elegant Swiss-made gold-plated wristwatch from the 1940s. Classic style and excellent craftsmanship, still in working order.
